description:
30 Days to $2500 selling Stuff Online and Offline is a strategy laced process to help you make some serious side cash during your spare time. You will be amazed at the things you can sell that make serious coin but are not exactly the first thing to come to mind.

Selling stuff is easy once you know what to do!

In this course I given you a proven strategy on how to make money by selling things online and off. Some of the places to sell are obvious and some places you expect to sell I actually recommend that you don't sell there!

This course is video based. Some people will complete course within 30 days and some a little longer. If you like people and want to learn how to sell thing this is the course for you!
title: Create a Business Selling Products Online and Offline
